inputs.name: active
inputs.text: Defines the status of the collapse component: opened or closed.

inputs.name: iconPosition
inputs.text: Defines the icon's position within the collapse's header

inputs.name: duration
inputs.text: Defines the animation speed for the collapse motion. slow and fast refer to Oblique's predefined speeds of 250 and 600 milliseconds respectively. Alternatively, a duration in milliseconds can be specified.

outputs.name: active
outputs.text: Event that is emitted each time the active property is altered.

tokens.name: OBLIQUE_COLLAPSE_ACTIVE
tokens.text: The default value for active property that will be applied to all ObCollapseComponent throughout the application.

projection.name: [obCollapseHeader]
projection.text: Content that will be projected into the header, i.e. the part that will always be shown.

projection.name: [obCollapseMain]
projection.text: Content that will be projected into the main container, i.e. the part that will be hidden or shown
